title: Fed Officials Signal Cautious Approach to Rate Cuts Amid Inflation Concerns
summary: Federal Reserve officials indicated they will proceed carefully with interest rate reductions as inflation remains above target levels. Recent economic data suggests continued vigilance is needed.

title: Indian Rupee Weakens to Fresh Record Low Against Dollar
summary: The Indian rupee hit a new all-time low of 83.25 per dollar as global risk sentiment deteriorated and foreign investors continued selling domestic assets.

title: Global Bond Markets Face Pressure as Treasury Yields Climb
summary: Government bond prices fell worldwide as investors bet on sustained higher interest rates. Ten-year Treasury yields approached 4.5% in early trading.

title: The Future of Central Bank Digital Currencies in Emerging Markets
summary: Central bank digital currencies could transform monetary policy transmission in developing economies, but implementation challenges remain significant.

title: RBI Maintains Repo Rate at 6.5% in December Policy Review
summary: The Reserve Bank of India kept the benchmark repo rate unchanged for the eighth consecutive meeting, citing balanced growth and inflation dynamics.

title: Cross-Border Payment Systems: Efficiency and Financial Stability
summary: New research examines how modern cross-border payment systems can enhance efficiency while maintaining financial stability in an interconnected world.
